data.prayer: God, we pray both the men and women of Noord-Brabant, Netherlands will find ways to meet in groups of two or three to encourage and correct one another from your Word.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Noord-Brabant, Netherlands
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide seekers in Noord-Brabant, Netherlands to the gospel through searching YouTube or TikTok today.
data.verse: I love those who love me, and those who seek me find me.

data.section_summary: On average, 2 people will die without Jesus in the next hour in Noord-Brabant, Netherlands.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Father, please make every disciple be a disciple maker, every home a training center, and every church a church planting movement in the state of Noord-Brabant.
God in Heaven, only you can and should appoint evangelists. Please, appoint and send more to Noord-Brabant, Netherlands.
data.verse: And in the church God has appointed first of all apostles, second prophets, third teachers, then workers of miracles, and those with gifts of healing, helping, administration, and various tongues.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Tigre, Eritrean people. 0.1% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Father, let those from the 93,569 believers who are shaken and weak remember that your love will never fail them.
data.verse: Love never fails. But where there are prophecies, they will be done away with. Where there are various languages, they will cease. Where there is knowledge, it will be done away with.

data.prayer: There are 2,331,700 people living in the state of Noord-Brabant. Only about 93,569 might be believers.

data.section_summary:
the state of Noord-Brabant, Netherlands has a population of 2,331,700.

We estimate Noord-Brabant has 93,569 people who might know Jesus, 999,250 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 1,238,881 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 24 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 2,331,700 souls living in the state of Noord-Brabant with a taste for your Word. Make it sweet as honey in their mouth.
data.verse: How sweet are your words to my taste, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
